hiveArticle.body:
# <center> Namaste, Have a great day everyone</center>

### <center> My entries for today's #colorchallenge by @kalemandra</center>

<hr>

<center>This picture was taken in Bangalore, India. Yesterday I got to hold a DSLR camera of my friend and luckily I have seen this awesome looking flower. I clicked it and asked my friend to send the copy of the flower.</center>

<hr>

<center>Indigo Flower</center>

![_DSC0169.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmP7y18oqtuH43SqnzHcHpjWE5V7JxZ83ieBjHhKFFsVpJ/_DSC0169.jpg)

<hr>

<center>Camera - Nikon D3300, Lens 55-200 mm</center>

<hr>

# <center> Follow @codingdefined </center>
